Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class CardSelectionModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.CardSelectionModel
public class CardSelectionModel
extends java.lang.Object
CardSelectionModel class provides a model for card selection phase, which is made by the challenger.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.lang.String CHALLENGER_PHASE  
    private Deck deck  
    private Card selectedGod  
    private java.beans.PropertyChangeSupport virtualClient  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    CardSelectionModel​(Deck deck)
    Constructor CardSelectionModel receives the deck from the Game, in order to put the chosen cards inside it.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addListener​(java.lang.String propertyName, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
    Method addListener adds the virtual client listener to the card selection model, in order to fire event changes.
    boolean addToDeck​(Card god)
    Method addToDeck adds a chosen god (with command ADD) to the deck.
    Card getSelectedGod()
    Method getSelectedGod returns the god selected from the challenger.
    void setDescription​(java.lang.String description)
    Method setDescription sets the description inside the model, in order to print it in the RemoteView.
    void setNameList()
    Method setNameList sets the gods' name list and notifies the virtual client class, which sends them to the user.
    void setSelectedGod​(Card god)
    Method setSelectedGod sets the god selected by the challenger.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • CardSelectionModel

      public CardSelectionModel​(Deck deck)
      Constructor CardSelectionModel receives the deck from the Game, in order to put the chosen cards inside it.
      Parameters:
      deck - of type Deck - the cards deck.

  • Method Details

    • setSelectedGod

      public void setSelectedGod​(Card god)
      Method setSelectedGod sets the god selected by the challenger.
      Parameters:
      god - of type Card - the selection made by the challenger.

    • addToDeck

      public boolean addToDeck​(Card god) throws OutOfBoundException
      Method addToDeck adds a chosen god (with command ADD) to the deck.
      Parameters:
      god - of type Card - the chosen god.
      Returns:
      boolean true if everything goes well, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      OutOfBoundException - when the deck has reached the maximum capacity.

    • addListener

      public void addListener​(java.lang.String propertyName, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
      Method addListener adds the virtual client listener to the card selection model, in order to fire event changes.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - of type String - the virtual client property reference.
      listener - of type PropertyChangeListener - the listener to be added.

    • getSelectedGod

      public Card getSelectedGod()
      Method getSelectedGod returns the god selected from the challenger.
      Returns:
      the selectedGod (type Card) of this CardSelectionModel object.

    • setDescription

      public void setDescription​(java.lang.String description)
      Method setDescription sets the description inside the model, in order to print it in the RemoteView.
      Parameters:
      description - of type String - the description of the god.

    • setNameList

      public void setNameList()
      Method setNameList sets the gods' name list and notifies the virtual client class, which sends them to the user.
      See Also:
      VirtualClient
